content:
You decide to speak with the Kabbalistic Guardian and ask for more information about the task ahead of you. The Guardian explains that the dark force threatens to unravel the fabric of reality, and that the only way to stop it is to journey through the ten realms of the Tree of Life. Each realm represents a different aspect of spiritual attainment, and you will be confronted with obstacles and challenges that will test your willpower and self-esteem. The Guardian also informs you that you will be given the aid of allies and enemies, each with their own unique abilities and stories.

What would you like to do?

A) Accept the task and begin your journey
B) Refuse the task and go back to your normal life
C) Ask the Guardian for more clarification on the task

Please pick one of the options above (A,B,C) to continue.
